document.full_text: a provision in the budget would allow blackrock to be taxed by the state as a general business corporation rather than as a bank, which would save the firm millions of dollars in the future.
document.title: state weighs tax change for giant financial firm
lines_and_colors: a provision in the budget would allow blackrock to be taxed by the state as a general business corporation rather than as a bank, which would save the firm millions of dollars in the future.
